title: how to reconnect bot game and prevent ban?
body: so i tried ryze in a bot game and suddenly the game stops working attempting to reconnect. its not my internet since everything is working but the game isnt working. looked the server status and its ongoing and online. what do to to prevent any kind of penalty? i can save a replay of the video as proof it didnt work to connect

replies.body: You won't get a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) if it's just for one game.  If it's a custom game you should be okay as well.  I'm seeing reports of EU players disconnecting this morning, but I don't have a whole lot of info beyond that right now.  I'll keep my eyes out, though.
well luckily i didnt get any penalty thank you for helpful response :)
